items.name: Aggressive Growth Portfolio
items.description: This portfolio is designed for investment goals with a long-term horizon. It is best for investors focusing on high-growth potential with the ability to withstand higher market swings.

items.name: Bold Stack Portfolio
items.description: Designed for investment goals with a medium-long-term horizon. It is best suited for investors seeking long-term growth with somewhat less variable returns and above-average volatility.

items.name: Balanced Bundle Portfolio
items.description: This portfolio is designed for investment goals with a medium-term horizon. It is best for investors seeking relatively higher returns while being willing to accept modest risk.
